title: 都市古仙醫
author: 超爽黑啤
description: 大三學生葉不凡，碰瓷給母親籌集醫藥費，卻遇到不按套路出牌的女司機，被撞後獲得古醫門傳承，從此通醫術、修功法、玩轉都市，贏得無數美女青睞。
description_translated: Ye Bufan, a third-year college student, attempted to stage a car accident to raise money for his mother's medical expenses. However, he encountered a female driver who didn't play by the rules. After being hit, he acquired the inheritance of an ancient medical sect. From then on, he mastered medical skills, cultivated ancient techniques, navigated the city, and won the favor of countless beautiful women.
